attributes.action: Close school and cancel exam in U.K. now! Stop putting children at risk!
attributes.additional_details: They have to close the school before January and until the majority of people have been vaccinated.
attributes.background: Please close school at once. All the lockdown and tier 4 will not work until you close schools and let the children study online. Stop putting children parents and teacher at risk.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
